item.title: Hugo Basics
item.description: Hugo This will be my notes on getting Hugo up and running on Ubuntu, and then publishing on Github pages. Below is a series of commands to install Hugo and then create your first site. Then cd into directory, pick a theme from Hugo Themes, following the themes directions for installation. sudo snap install hugo hugo version hugo new site Hugo1 cd ./Hugo1 git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo "theme = 'ananke'" >> hugo.
